storyInfo: Warmy's Originium Arts suddenly go out of control in the middle of nowhere. Fortunately, they happen to run into Amiya, the Doctor, and Savage after their trip down memory lane. When the incident subsides, the Rhodes Island group decides to tag along on the journey to the Grinning Valley in search of a 'Feranmut.' Ray, afraid of Warmy losing control again, finally opens her heart.

attributes.text: Normally, we don't get closure right when something happens.
Just like when Mum and Aunt Jemma had that argument in the middle of the night. Such a noisy one it woke the neighbors––
They were arguing about the same old: 'How should the factory go about starting up the wheat grinder and the rice miller without disturbing the workers' rest.'
Just like those young Billy businessmen who helped the farmers and factory workers build a coalition during the 'Cage Incident'––

Even though they made an effort to break free of the grasp of the counts and the Victorian Chamber of Commerce, how many of them were just in it for the business? How many of them actually cared about the future of the Rim Billitonians?
Also, just like that one trip, with the Doctor and Amiya...
Maybe some questions will always have some sort of closure.

attributes.content: Eh? Dunno where you're gonna go yet?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Wasn't heading back to the nomadic platform to search for traces of your childhood just the first stop along the journey? Like, what happened to the second stop, and third stop, and so on...?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I filled a tank of gas and even prepped a portable stove and a tent...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Besides, the Rim Billiton Miners' Cup is in the group stage right now... If we head straight south, we might make it in time for the cross-country burdenbeast race across Big Hammer Mine...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Or maybe we could go for some of Rim Billiton's local specialties? I've committed a lotta fantastic eateries to memory over the last few years, especially the ones that've opened up inside hollowed-out mining tunnels.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: In any case, Kal'tsit said that you guys don't have any work coming up for the next little while. So, why not put that whole Victoria thing on the backburner for now?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Th-There's no need to be pushy, Savage... It's not that I'm too worried about what's over the horizon to enjoy the trip or anything!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What I mean is, I think I might prefer how we used to do things before, like just wandering around without any particular goal in mind.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, umm, that might not be entirely accurate either. I'm sure the Doctor had some idea of where we were going.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: ...I did?

attributes.content: Because as far as I can remember, it seems like new things are happening every day, and there are always different sights to see.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we were here to casually tour through Rim Billiton's barrenlands, we'd probably just be seeing a whole lot of sand, mines, and Originium clusters.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, about that... I think that's moreso you're having a streak of bad luck, and getting yourselves into trouble the whole way here...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: At least Amiya's more than capable of holding her own now, and I'm not the same empty-headed, hot-blooded newbie I was before. Even if we run into a scrap, I'm sure we can resolve it without too much hassle...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: S-Sorry about that, Doctor!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Doctor! Are you alright? Did you bump your head?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What was that sound just now?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Doctor... If you've hurt your head, please speak up...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It's fine... My head's still intact.

attributes.content: Savage... What happened? Why'd you suddenly slam on the brakes?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Take a look over there––
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: See that transport vehicle over there coughin' up smoke?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Jacker, go get some bottletree water. The more the better!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Bring a tarp over and help me hold her up.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Then, grab some tape and tie her to the condensate pipe, then dip her feet in cold water and give her a good soak.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Okay. But, why?
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Call it a trade secret. Doesn't matter if it's a fever or a burn, this is the fastest way to cool down!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Medicine's fine and all, but you sometimes need to tackle the external problem head on, and this is the way you do it!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Lanns...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Don't worry. There's nothing to be scared of. I've got meds. I figured something like this would happen sooner or later... Hurry up and drink, Warmy.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: She's burning up.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: She has the strength to swallow the meds, so it's not as bad as it could be. The fever should be going down soon.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Yeah. I know it can't be that serious. Trust me.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright, I believe you.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: But, I don't think what she has is a fever.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: It's her Arts. She used them to fiddle with the temperature of the power plant again. Without my permission.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Shoulda dawned on me a lot earlier when I realized how smooth the ride was and how much power we had driving on these roads.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I don't know how many times I've told her not to go around casting with her bare hands, but she just can't get it drilled into her head. She's always eager to prove her own worth.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Silly girl. What a darned fool. I knew from the moment she got in the truck that she was dumb and stubborn...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: ...Damned dipstick.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: We can always find a doctor. We're not that far from a platform.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: You're not getting anything from those docs that I can't already do.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Trust me, we'll be fine. I'll get us through this.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: If you say so...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Alanna, the power cabin's getting hotter and hotter.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Yeah? Can't tell, since my back's still dripping cold sweat...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Agh. She's burning up. How.. is she this hot?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I've got another folk remedy. Can you go catch some Originium slugs...?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alanna, there's the bell. Someone wants to board.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Gah. Go chase them off, jacker.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: No, you should go.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: It'll be bad if her Arts go out of control. She'll hurt herself, and others too.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: What are you trying to say––
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: No way. No way it would come to that. Not a chance. She's my own adopted daughter.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You just wait, Ray. I'll take care of this whole mess.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: If an Infected gets sick, or if their Arts start going out of control, it should be another Infected to deal with it.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: That way, even if they disintegrate, it at least won't create new victims.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: That's standard protocol on the job.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Get out.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Wait a sec! I'm the driver for that vehicle over there. I've got tools. Do you need any help?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Help? Hah. With what? I'm doing just fine over here.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: We're just taking a little break over here. So, if you wanna help, buggering off would do us just fine.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Huh? But your ute over there is giving off white smoke. Doesn't look to be in great shape...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: That's just how it is. I'm the one driving it. Think you know her better than me?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Sorry. I'd still like to get in and have a look around.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I don't have time to give you a ride.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Last warning. Go away, or I'll make you go away.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: ...You're shaking.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Who, me? Don't kid yourself.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Though, that gear you're wearing...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: ––You're a troublemaker who's done something bad, aren't you?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ––And you're a merc out on the hunt for Infected people, yeah?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: An explosion–– from inside the bus?!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Strewth, I told you to bugger off! I don't have time for you!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Hey, wait!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: What's going on with that truck? Its body is damaged in several areas, and the front's rather deformed...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The smoke should be coming from the condensate pipe not properly dispersing the heat...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: And then, there's that driver...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: She seems to be worse for wear than the bus itself...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Poor gray-ears.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: The engine has long since stalled, but the sound of water flowing through the condensate pipe can still be heard from the power cabin.
The temperature inside the cabin is unusually high, but the drenched Potlid continues to shiver.
Alanna said this was supposed to help.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Just... a bit longer... then...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: As her words trail off, Potlid's lips quiver slightly, as if sleep-talking.
Ray thinks for a moment, then holds the girl's scorching-hot hand. Though the hand subconsciously tries to shrink away, it has no strength to do so.
...Burning hot.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: It's alright. Now, I'll be able to see how badly your Arts are going out of control.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: This isn't any miraculous technique or anything, but I can at least reduce the danger a bit.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Some people are fine sticking their head in the sand, some coop themselves up in abandoned mine shafts and wait for the whole thing to get blown up and sealed off, and others try to run far, far away into the barrens.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Sure. People get sick, just like old parts get rusty. Bound to happen.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: As long as you handle it properly, it won't affect anyone else, and it won't turn into a big deal.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I don't want this...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: ...Ray!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Easy there, gray-ears. Your body temperature's still high.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: A long time ago, everyone in my family, the whole family, they were all Infected.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: All of them... knew how to put their noses to the grindstone. They built their own homes... and lived simple but fulfilling lives.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: I was happy too. I could... make a big pot of soup and share it with everyone...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: They'd eat yummy food... and then they'd get better. After they got better, they wouldn't need to come back anymore...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Easy now, gray-ears. If your temperature gets any higher...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: A few sparks crackle through the air.
I can't hold you anymore.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I know what I'm doing, gray-ears. Some people don't know how to control their own strength, and end up hurting people or even killing them by accident. But, that's not me. I'm going to knock you out... You'll just be sore for a few days.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I'm letting go now.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: If I... eat more... and grow up more... and my sickness gets better... Dad, will also come back...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Why... were those people on the road looking for Infected? Why do I have to hurt Lanns, just because I'm an Infected?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: The rawness of the blisters on her hand force Ray to pause.
Ray....
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Is it bad... to be an Infected?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Gray-ears... You must be hurting.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I can feel it.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: There are times when the Oripathy flares up and I can't sleep, I know.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: But when I remember that ray of light shining through... I can relax, and finally close my eyes in peace.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: 'Feranmut'...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: ...Calm, gray-ears. Calm down. I WILL find it.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: ––Potlid! Potlid!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: How's she doing?!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You... This blood...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alanna, I...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: ...Gray-ears is fine, but stay back. Her heat's gone down a little.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: She's already caused a small explosion. Alanna, these damaged internal components and broken pipes, are they a big deal?
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: The pipe is whatever, but...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The medicine... doesn't seem to be working.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: See, I said you needed help...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...Huh? The saw, wrenches, duct tape... And, this girl... I've seen her before...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Why'd you tie this little girl up? What are you doing to her?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: What am I doing?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: What... am I even capable of doing?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alanna...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I'm not an idiot. You think I don't know these tricks don't work? You think I haven't seen an old friend getting heatstroke in the workshop, then being tortured with these crude methods to the point that he never came to work again?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: 'Rusty Wrench' managed to survive. Couldn't talk anymore, but he could still work; Old Bobby said it saved his life... But, you think I don't know they're the exception that proves the rule?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You really think... I don't know Oripathy is an intractable disease?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But, this dumb kid doesn't know that. She thinks she can be cured. What else can I do but play along?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I believe in the little medicine I can get my hands on, and whatever folk remedies reach my ears.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I can't just... watch another one die in front of me while I watch helplessly.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.options: Greetings, ma'am.
Mind if we take a look at the girl?

attributes.content: Sleep peacefully now. You don't have to burn yourself anymore
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm sorry for using my Arts on you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: May you be free from the pain and suffering of Oripathy in your dreams.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Her subconscious casting has already stopped.;Good work, Amiya.

attributes.content: I could feel it. She is a deeply wounded girl.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is there anything else I can help with, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: We're good for now.
A simple injection should take care of things.

attributes.content: I'm done with my Arts too... Go ahead and let the others in.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is she really going to be okay?!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Mhm. Her subconscious casting has stopped, and the activation process of the Originium crystals inside her body has also been halted. But the fever symptoms haven't been completely relieved yet, and we'll have to continue monitoring her for a while.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've been driving this truck around for who-knows-how-long. Never thought I'd run into a doctor in a place like this...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: ...All I can say is, thank you.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You're welcome. Treating the Infected has always been Rhodes Island's duty.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That said, I'm not a doctor, and the Doctor is, well, not that kind of doctor. Just to be sure, we should get to the Rhodes Island branch office ASAP, where we'd have real diagnostic and treatment equipment to properly examine the patient.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: That reminds me. The girl gave me a card, saying that some lady told her... to give it to her family.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Oh, I'm the lady.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The girly was clearly infected, I figured her family ought to understand...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hah, found it. This is the one. The symbol of the excavator drill pointed straight at the sky.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: ...the what?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ain't easy doing business around Rim Billiton these days. Competition's too fierce, so figured it wouldn't be a bad idea to go tucking instead.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But your company offers some serious benefits. It's absolutely wild that you'd have such an advanced medical department in a construction firm... If only the Billy companies could learn from you guys!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Um, Alanna, I think there's been a little misunderstanding...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, I do agree with you. If all of Rim Billiton's companies committed to raising awareness about the Oripathy prevention, our young patient here might not be in such serious condition right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And... we should really put what we do at Rhodes Island front-and-center on our business cards. After all, the Infected rarely have proper access to medical services.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In any case, we'll have a proper medical team dedicated to Warmy's treatment at the branch office. If it's not too much trouble for you, I'd like you to drive for the nearest nomadic city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Wait, hold on.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: There's a bit of a special situation with the truck. Once we go back, we might not be able to leave again. Plus... I have an agreement with someone else.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Special situation? Oh, that reminds me, you're supposed to be a transport, right?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But, if you keep going in that direction, the only thing waiting for you is an uninhabited wasteland that's prone to Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Wait, don't tell me... You were planning to go plant bottletrees there?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: No... We're... going to search for the 'Feranmut'...
...Feranmut?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Please... don't leave Warmy behind...
attributes.name: Potlid
Alanna
attributes.content: Don't worry, nobody's leaving you behind. We're just having a little discussion.

attributes.name: Alanna
attributes.content: Potlid?!
attributes.joined: Don't worry, nobody's leaving you behind. We're just having a little discussion.Potlid?!

attributes.content: You're awake?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: How's your head? Are you dizzy? Are you still running hot?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Lanns... You look so upset... Did something happen? I think I just had a long and tiring dream...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: ...Mm, at the very end of the dream, I think I even saw the Feranmut.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Ray asked me to take a good, long look at the giant shadow. I looked and looked as hard as I could, but I couldn't quite make it out.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Lanns, can I go with you to find the Feranmut?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Here, try this.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: This is all we have now; it hardly enough to express our thanks.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Not only did you save Potlid, but you're even willing to travel with us to make sure she's okay.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: No worries, Alanna. We had no particular destination in mind to begin with.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Also, the Doctor's intrigued by the Feranmut you mentioned.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's done, Alanna. I've pulled into the transport bay.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The rest of the journey is up to you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hah, no problem there.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But there is one thing I still don't understand. What exactly is this 'Feranmut' you're searching for?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It's a type of... Uhh, this massive...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: All you need to know is, it's some sort of mythical creature! I've heard there are incredible explorers out there planning to turn these legends into documented columns!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: As for this beast, it flies for months at a time over the windswept dunes of Rim Billiton, flying over the highest peaks to spew flames at the sun. It appears in the mist of nightfall with a luster more brilliant than the moons!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: We set out this time to look for some more useful clues! Isn't that right? Um... Ray?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You talking about the lady with the crossbow over there who's hardly said a word this entire time?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Forget it. She can enjoy the cold wind by her lonesome.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: In any case, that's how mighty a Feranmut is.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Eh... That legend sounds all over the place. Don't think I've heard anything of the sort before.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I've heard of it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A massive fowlbeast devours the clouds in the sky. Before it can finish eating the last cloud, right before the day the sky falls, the people on its back all jump into the boundless sea of stars...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A long time ago, the Doctor used to tell me bedtime stories like that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I did?;Sorry... Don't remember that.

attributes.content: Well, umm, of course, you put it in different words, but...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have a vague memory... Your tone at the time, it really made me want to believe the stories were real.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Never would've guessed it, but looks like our friend here has quite a vivid imagination underneath that hood.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But we're not after fairy stories here! We're looking for the real deal!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Mmmmh~ The freshly stewed, piping-hot sweet potato soup is ready!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Woo, this is the good stuff! Hurry up and dig in, everyone!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Appreciate it, Warmy!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Don't mention it. There's also veggies cooking in the pot!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Wait a minute... This flavor... Why does it have a hint of Originium slug?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Umm, well, I did add a little bit of slug slime.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I've tried it before, and the flavor's not too bad. It's soft and chewy, doesn't stick to your teeth, and it shouldn't be poisonous at all.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Wow, I think you're on to something.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: By the way, Alanna, the food you served up before was pretty good. I didn't expect you to be such a cook.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Is it really so surprising? Do I look to you like a woman who doesn't know her way around the kitchen? The factory workers were always tripping over each other to get at my food!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Though... my real specialties are way more flavorful. Don't care at all for this light, time-consuming stuff.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Everything you ate just now, from the beet soup to the Originium slug slime sweet potato stew, was all prepared by Potlid here. I just served it.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: It's Warmy's work? I know she's getting better and all, but... are you sure it's wise to let her do all that by herself?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Let her rest up, and I'll handle the rest!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Calm down– Don't go bugging her over it. She can handle it.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: If anything, I think she'd be sad if she felt like there was nothing she could do.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: She's always been like that, wanting to prove that she's all grown up and capable... Which is how she ended up in this condition.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Oh, right, Alanna...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Has Warmy... been through something?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even though she's always smiling and full of energy, I feel... a deep sorrow coming from her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Her inner feelings seem at complete odds with her smile.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Haha.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Kids like to act strong and tough. That's all there is to it.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But, normal kids don't cling to it in that way...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's because of what her father said to her before he left home: 'I want you to grow up happily, just as you are now'...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The day before he left, it was her birthday. Nasty business, right? Children tend to take things like birthdays and birthday wishes awfully seriously.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Then, where is her dad now...?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Who knows? All I know is, the girl relies on me, because every time her father left home for work, it was in this vehicle.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Miners are the most common types you'll see aboard, with Cautuses a close second. And her father happened to be both. Like hell I'd be able to pick him out of a crowd.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Though, did I ever mention to you that this ol' girl's about to go out of commission?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Because several of the mines I used to stop at got shut down. The last one was due to deep depletion, all the rocks that got dug up were totally worthless. And then two years ago... a mining accident claimed another.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: And so it was over the last two years, when this kid hopped onboard, saying that if she didn't keep the brightest smile on her face, her father wouldn't recognize her.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright, I'm gonna go give her some motivation, and a helping hand. She's probably a bit too fired up right now and wants to make a miners' family dinner on that little Originium stove you guys brought over.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You're pretty nice people too. It's been a long time since she's cooked for anyone else.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Though, I hope what you said when you sat down at this table is true: that you won't end up getting sick breaking bread with Infected...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Or at least, you're like me. Y'know, good things happen to good people and all. So that makes it perfectly fine to live with the Infected.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: She didn't know the danger she was putting herself in when she decided to keep Warmy around.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Amiya.

attributes.content: I'm here, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Do you feel guilty about it?;Do you think fate smiled on us?

attributes.content: Oh, is it written all over my face or something? I was just thinking...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I keep thinking, what would have happened... had you never pulled me from the wreckage of that vehicle?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Walking along the streets of Rim Billiton, I always feel like those running and shouting Cautus children... are no different from me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Disasters aren't uncommon in Rim Billiton. The dangerous old ways of mining, the unusually frequent Catastrophes...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Heh. There were some Victorian businessmen who said this is no way for people to live.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Oh, of course I'm not trying to say that life in Rim Billiton is terrible or anything... Though the natural environment here may be harsh, our homes are always full of warmth.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rim Billiton's large households often come together to jointly adopt children.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... I'm just happier that I get to do something like this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Like being able to help Potlid?;Like fighting to protect the Infected?

attributes.content: Also, like being able to rescue you. And before that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The young Cautus doesn't finish her words. You know there's something she's hiding from you.
Amiya's expression is somewhat wistful, but there's no sign of regret or remorse.
...Now that I'm looking back, every year since I left home has been so terribly long.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everything seems to be speeding by around me, before I can grow taller or change out of my childhood clothes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, I find myself wondering... When I think of my mum and dad, what should I say to them to give them an idea of what I've been through...? So that they still recognize me?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, coming back to Rim Billiton, it finally dawned on me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The only thing I want to tell my parents is – I survived.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because the Doctor took my hand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You suddenly remember something.
You remember the huge Rim Billiton logo emblazoned on the laser mining module mounted atop the Rhodes Island landship. You remember seeing it before.
You remember some of the materials that Rhodes Island has gradually been making available to you lately.
Rhodes Island's predecessor, 'Babel,' customized this Rim Billiton mining module that was attacked during the initial shipment.
The mercenary team dispatched by Babel failed to stave off the attack, resulting in the deaths of many people on the transport team.
You remember the thick, black smoke, slowly burning in the empty wilderness.
Vague, distant emotions float into your mind along with the hazy memories.
Though it still doesn't feel like your own past, you cannot help but to feel an infinite...

attributes.options: ...Loneliness.

attributes.content: What I wanted to search for... Was the vestiges of the journey that began here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As well as the traces of Rhodes Island being dug out from here and towed across the entirety of Rim Billiton, before setting sail for the far reaches of the continent.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I was just thinking...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If I had never met Rhodes Island, if I had never met Dr. Kal'tsit or Theresa... If I had never met the Doctor––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What a shame it all would've been.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Phew... Finally helped tidy up around here.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But seriously, never would've expected Alanna and Warmy to be living together inside a truck like this. Good thing I didn't charge in, waving my hammer around, to try to rescue Warmy, or else this thing would've been a goner.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Speaking of which, when was the last time I had a campfire dinner with this many people?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Has there ever been another time where I got to enjoy such a merry one with Amiya and the Doctor?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: A grunt? That's it?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Does it not make your blood boil? Those bastards in suits want to plunder our mines! And since when did my friends become as snobbish as the Victorians?!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...Sorry.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I was just... thinking about the stories in some old books.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Don't look at us like that.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The way you look at the stars in the sky.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...Even back then, I wasn't always happy every time.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Amiya and the Doctor... they're fast asleep?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Must've had too much fun and gotten tired, huh? Seriously, it's not safe here. You'll catch a cold at this rate...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Savage?

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Doctor, you're awake?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It's pretty dark tonight, and I couldn't see your face clearly and...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Did I wake you?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: There are some beasts out there that never sleep.;Some people are still awake.

attributes.content: So you're looking out for Amiya here, huh?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Fair enough. The Billy barrens have always been dangerous, and the people you meet aren't always friendly.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ––Which is why, you have no idea how anxious I was when I first met you!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You, a sickly foreigner, trekking through the wilderness with a little girl in tow! You were a goner!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You weren't afraid because you didn't know a thing about Rim Billiton. I could write it off as Amiya trusting you regardless...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...But it wasn't until a lot later when I understood why she always slept so soundly next to you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: You make me sound smart.;You make me sound like I'm always on my toes.

attributes.content: Well, yeah. You have a good grasp of everything, and a lot of tools at your disposal.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But, there are other areas where you don't seem that smart, which became evident the more we traveled together.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Like that one time you said, 'I know these berries are incredibly bitter,' but then took a big bite of them anyway before urging Amiya not to do the same.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...Well, yeah. You rarely get any time to rest.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Be it the barren wilderness, the glimmering of the starry sky, or the steel frames and cranes rising over a city, you can stare blankly at these things for a long, long time.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Maybe you didn't consciously decide to stay up to stand guard for Amiya, but you nevertheless managed to help her avoid some ferocious fowlbeasts and highwaymen.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mind if I take a seat?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...It's just like it was.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: *sigh*... I wanted to tell you something along the way, but we ended up getting tangled up in another weird mess again.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: At least there wasn't any real danger.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Were our travels like this back then too?

attributes.content: Well... For me, the biggest difference was my attitude, I suppose?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: To be honest, I was a bit disappointed back then, and wanted to go for a walk. A really long one.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: I heard about it from the other Rim Billitonian operators.
You would've been even more famous here.

attributes.content: Well, yeah. It was because of that 'Cage Incident.'
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But after everything was said and done, I followed you and Amiya on that trip, and to everyone else, it seemed like I'd ghosted them. By the time I returned, they'd mostly forgotten about the whole deal.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Which is exactly what I wanted.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: At the time, I saw businessmen signing contracts to develop the mines for the people of Rim Billiton, but they turned around and threw us into cages, same way predators in the wilds snatch their meals.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But, I'm even sadder about the ones who promised to protect our land together, swearing not to let the old dukes strip us of our dignity.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Some people, as soon as they tasted wealth and status, turned out no different from the businessmen and robber barons.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hmph. Just thinking about it makes me want to swing my hammer around and smash their glass houses to bits.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Please calm down, Savage.

attributes.content: Oh! I'm so, so, so sorry, Doctor! I didn't mean to scare you...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Heehee. It feels crazy to be telling this story again.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: In any case, I was absolutely furious at the time.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I couldn't stand that feeling. Like people were suddenly plucked out of their own skin, made to become completely different people. That look in their distant eyes... didn't seem like any way you'd ever look at a friend...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: To sum it all up, I can't trust them anymore.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: And so I... have trouble understanding certain others.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Might I, by any chance, know once such individual?;Whoever those 'certain others' are, I hope they can live up to your expectations.

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. My hammer's just for protecting you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You and Amiya both gave me your answers.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Amiya already told me she's willing to go down that path, and doesn't regret it at all.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I can see how heavily that burden sits on her shoulders, but now, all I can do is try to help her carry some of that burden.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: As for you, Doctor...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: This isn't right, Kal'tsit. What are you playing at here? What happened to Amiya's body? How could you leave a CHILD as young as her to suffer this?!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ––Tell me, was this the Doctor's decision? Is she nothing but a pawn to the Doctor?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I... I wanted you to swear to it. I couldn't shake the doubts that I had, but I also wanted to have faith in you, so I asked for a vow.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You promised that after you took Amiya from Rim Billiton, that you'd do your best to treat her with kindness and let her grow up healthy... and free.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...Yeah, I know.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: There's no use asking for answers from an amnesiac Doctor.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But how about you, Kal'tsit? Are you waiting too?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Alright, two can play at that game. Time will tell all.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The same goes for you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: If there's anything you need from me, please let me know.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: (Point into the distance)

attributes.content: Hm? Already?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Oh, that's right.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: She's been sitting there all night.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Doctor, are you trying to say that she's a threat?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Or, is your assessment something altogether different?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It's gotten late. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: If anything, you should go rest and replenish your stamina, since you were the one who got hurt today.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Warmy made a ton of food, and Alanna already put it away in the truck. I can go grab it and heat some up for you if you'd like.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: She's quite the chef, you know. I'd feel bad for you if you missed out.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: How's she doing?
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: She's fine now.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Actually, you should go see her yourself.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Thank you. All of you.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: But I... I felt her pain.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I always thought I didn't fear pain... But now, I can't stop trembling.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: The woman holding the weapon is not shaking at all.
She simply stares into the night sky, as if she dares not avert her eyes or look anywhere else.
...I've seen Infected burn themselves to ash.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Sometimes, the only choice for those Infected who can no longer be saved is to send them away.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Something like that... should never happen to Warmy.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I... feel so terrible.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: From the very beginning... I was the reason why the truck went off-route.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Yeah. Alanna told me everything.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Do you want to turn around and leave?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: But at least, I should...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Good enough for me. I mean, even the Doctor's interested in that Feranmut you mentioned now.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The stars sure are beautiful, aren't they? You've been staring at 'em for a while now.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...I can't say.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: All I know is, they're far, far away, and shimmering in the darkness.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: It's slightly better than staring just at the darkness.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Are you afraid of the dark?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: No. It's always so dark in the mines that I've long since gotten used to it.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: The mines, huh? Well, I guess you probably don't care too much then, huh?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I totally get you. I used to work underground as a security officer, and it was always stuffy as hell.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I also know that sometimes, people are too afraid to look at the things around them because they don't want to be sad, and so they look up into the sky.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: What do you see? And what are you looking for?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Why'd you decide to go truckjacking in the first place?
attributes.name: Savage
